Text: She's fat?Don't think so.Nice body though

Yeah a lot of the youngfatties women aren't what I'd call fat.  But in a culture where men supposedly prefer women who are very thin, any woman that's "about right" is seen as "fat".  

So, new fairy tale:  The first one was tooooo skinny.  The second one was tooooo fat.  The third one was just right.  :)
Just found out about this site a sec ago when I did a search on Gianna. Yeah these chicks are thick but defiantly not fat. Except for that one with the 4 rolls in the mini pic.
